text: Shahla Riahi (, 7 February 1927 â€“ 31 December 2019) was an Iranian actress and movie director. She was born in Tehran. In 1956, she became the first Iranian woman to direct a feature, with Marjan. Her career as an actress includes more than 72 movies. Riahi died on 31 December 2019 in Tehran at the age of 92.Veteran Iranian actress Shahla Riahi passes away ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Iranian movie directors Category:Actors from Tehran
